ComicInfo.Summary:
With the threat of a doomsday weapon looming before them, Edgar Rice Burroughsâ€™ greatest heroes rage into battle to protect the innocent. Who will survive? Can they defeat evil in time? Find out in the epic conclusion of The Greatest Adventure!
